document.full_text: two men were killed and eight of their relatives were hurt when the family's rented sailboat capsized in san diego bay on sunday evening, harbor police said.
document.title: two dead, 8 hurt after sailboat capsizes off san diego
lines_and_colors: two men were killed and eight of their relatives were hurt when the family's rented sailboat capsized in san diego bay on sunday evening, harbor police said.
